What is connected to the right leg of the button?
It's wrong. You should connect a resistor between button and ground

Is the motor always rotating?
I think the bug is not caused by the motor but the IC. Please check if the IC is connected well.
Please check if the motor is functional. (Connect the motor to the power and ground)
Which pin of IC is connected to the motor?
Which pin of IC is connected to the Arduino's pin?
Motor Logic Pin is to control the motor rotating right or left
The IC seems right. I already sent the question to the real TA. In the meantime, please check again if the power and ground is well connected to Arduino.
Motor Power Supply means the power supply used to drive the Motor (e.g. 5V)
Motor Logic Pin is to control the motor rotating right or left
EN is to control the motor speed
